summary.description:
A Multimodal and Integrated Approach to Interrogate Human Kidney Biopsies with Rigor and Reproducibility.

Welcome to Kidney Precision Medicine Project.

The Kidney Precision Medicine Project (KPMP) is focused on finding new ways to treat acute kidney injury and chronic kidney disease. We will be obtaining kidney tissues from individuals volunteering to participate in an effort to redefine kidney disease in molecular terms and identify novel targeted therapies.

||| CORRECT NAME OF TOOL COULD ALSO BE 'KPMP TIS', 'TME', 'JBH', 'MTE'
summary.name: KPMP
